Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends Object
    Program creates an array of cards to represent a deck. An object of type Card represents a playing card. The card has a suit, which can be spades, hearts, diamonds, or clubs.

      • suitToString

        public String suitToString()
        Returns a String representation of the card's suit.
        Returns:
        one of the strings "Spades", "Hearts", "Diamonds", "Clubs".

      • rankToString

        public String rankToString()
        Returns a String representation of the card's rank.
        Returns:
        for a regular card, one of the strings "Ace", "2", "3", ..., "10", "Jack", "Queen", or "King".

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this card, including both its suit and its rank.

        Returns:
